openSource.title: Portfolio
openSource.description: A modern portfolio developed with Next.js, showcasing my web development skills and projects. It features smooth animations and an intuitive user interface.

openSource.title: Madabina
openSource.description: A project that implements PCA from scratch to visualize clustering and reduce dimensions, only using with NumPy.

openSource.title: Ramax
openSource.description: A project that involves visualizing qualitative data and encoding it using OneHotEncoding for quantification. It serves to impute data through optimization algorithms and machine learning.

clientProjects.title: Livri
clientProjects.description: A B2B SaaS platform for restaurants and their suppliers, built with Django Rest Framework and Next.js.

clientProjects.title: Majlis
clientProjects.description: An administration tool for disciplinary councils for university departments, built with Electron, Express.js, and React.

research.title: SCA-GWO Hybrid Imputation
research.description: A novel hybrid metaheuristic approach combining Sine Cosine Algorithm (SCA) and Grey Wolf Optimizer (GWO) for missing data imputation in water potability classification. Achieved up to 72.26% accuracy on the Water Potability dataset, demonstrating the effectiveness of optimization algorithms for handling incomplete environmental datasets.
research.authors: Salah Arab, Amir Madjour, Mohamed Bennabi, Soltane Rezaigia, Anes Benyelles, Radhi Badache
research.institution: University of Science and Technology, Oran
